attributes.action: Block further support to Ukraine until after an inquiry into use of past aid
attributes.additional_details:
Great Britain gave £2.3bn in aid to Ukraine in 2022/2023 and 2023/24 and have further pledged £2.5bn for 2024/2025.
 
We demand an investigative public inquiry into how Ukraine have used the aid given so far, before any further aid is provided.
 
We demand to see how this aid has been used, and what benefit it has had to the Ukrainians. We demand a full audited breakdown of how this aid has been used, and request no further funding is permitted until this has been completed.
attributes.background: We want the Government to stop the £2.5bn pledged aid to Ukraine until an independent, transparent public inquiry has been completed into how past aid has been used.
